properties.Label: Lynchburg City Staduim Improvements
properties.ProjectTitle: Lynchburg City Stadium Capital Maintenance Reserve
properties.ProjectDescription: Reserves for capital maintenance expenditures at the City Baseball Stadium as outlined in the Franchise Agreement. Funds will be used for mutually agreed upon expenditures of a capital nature such as repair, replacement, maintenance, and improvements.
properties.DepartmentPriority: Project contributes to generation of new revenue
properties.Creator: JOHNSAE
